claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Lumen Ann Pierce is a fictional character portrayed by Julia Stiles in the Showtime television series Dexter , season 5 .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Lumen is introduced in the third episode  (  `` Practically Perfect ''  )  as a survivor of rapist-serial killer Boyd Fowler .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She remains for the rest of the season , and leaves following the season 5 finale , `` The Big One '' .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In season 5 , episode 5 , `` First Blood '' , Lumen is revealed to have been beaten and gang raped by a group of men , including Boyd Fowler .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She witnesses Dexter Morgan kill Fowler , and thus becomes a key player in Dexter 's life .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Dexter rescues her , but initially thinks he has no choice but to kill her in order to eliminate a witness .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He eventually decides to spare her life , however .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: To earn Lumen 's trust , Dexter shows her the fate of Boyd 's dead victims , tells her he saved her from the same fate , and confides his wife was murdered by someone like Boyd .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Lumen asks Dexter to help her seek revenge against her abusers , but he initially refuses .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: However , after Lumen continues on her own and targets the wrong suspect , Dexter teaches her the importance of knowing a person is guilty before killing him .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He entreats her to leave Miami ; she agrees at first , but decides to stay after a pat-down at the airport brings back memories of her abuse .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She goes out on her own and shoots one of her attackers , but panics not knowing what to do with his body ; she calls Dexter , who reluctantly helps her cover up the murder .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: That night , she tells him that killing the man brought her a sense of peace that she knows will not last ; she believes she will have to kill all of her attackers to get over her abuse for good .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Dexter realizes that she harbors a `` Dark Passenger '' much like his and agrees to help , in part to find his own closure following Rita 's murder .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The two then systematically hunt down and kill Lumen 's abusers , and in the process become lovers .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Lumen leaves Dexter in the season finale , however , after realizing she no longer feels the need to kill .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Lumen exited the show following the events of `` The Big One '' .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: She had a recurring role as Lumen Pierce in the fifth season of the Showtime series Dexter  (  2010  )  , a role that earned her nominations for the Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress -- Series , Miniseries or Television Film and the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Guest Actress in a Drama Series .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Stiles appears in the Blue web series also broadcast on television  (  2012 -- present  )  .

claim: Lumen Pierce appears on a screen.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Born and raised in New York City , Stiles began acting at age 11 and made her screen debut as Erica Dansby in six episodes of the television series Ghostwriter  (  1993-1994  )  .
